thread.title: Bayern Munich mock Arsenal after latest Champions League drubbing - "same again next year?"
thread.title_full: Bayern Munich mock Arsenal after latest Champions League drubbing - "same again next year?"

author: Liam Prenderville
title: Bayern Munich mock Arsenal after latest Champions League drubbing - "same again next year?"
text:
Bayern have thumped Arsenal in each of the last two seasons (Photo: Reuters) Share Get daily   Could   
Bayern Munich couldn't resist the opportunity to mock Arsenal after their latest Champions League victory. 
The Gunners were thumped 5-1 at the Allianz Arena in the last-16 first-leg encounter. 
The tie is as good as over with Arsenal fans turning up the heat on boss Arsene Wenger after the latest humiliation on the biggest stage. 
Just last season, Arsenal lost by the same scoreline in Munic h after another woeful performance. 
And Bayern made sure Arsenal fans wouldn't forget their dismal record in Germany. 
The club's official Twitter account uploaded a picture from last night alongside a shot of the scoreboard from November 2015 
The tweet was as simple as it was brutal, reading: "Same again next year?" Arsene Wenger looks on (Photo: Getty) Alexis Sanchez cuts a frustrated figure (Photo: Reuters) 
The defeat continues Arsenal's shocking record in the knockout stages of the competition. 
They have suffered defeat in the Champions League at the last-16 stage in each of the last six seasons and another exit almost certainly beckons. 
Gunners fans have put more pressure on boss Wenger to depart after the latest humiliation. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
